trans-unit.source: Specifies how verbs should be rendered on a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 指定在 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> 控制項上呈現動詞命令的方式。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.WebPartVerbRenderMode%2A> property determines whether verbs on <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls in a Web Parts zone are rendered in each control's title bar, or in a drop-down verbs menu.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.WebPartVerbRenderMode%2A>屬性會決定是否在動詞<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>中每個控制項標題列，或在下拉式清單動詞命令功能表中的方式呈現 Web 組件區域中的控制項。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerbRenderMode> enumeration contains values that can be applied to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.WebPartVerbRenderMode%2A> property to specify how the verbs should be rendered.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerbRenderMode>列舉包含值，可以套用至<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.WebPartVerbRenderMode%2A>屬性來指定應該用來呈現動詞命令的方式。

trans-unit.source: Verbs are rendered in a shortcut menu in the title bar.
trans-unit.target: 動詞命令呈現在標題列的捷徑功能表中。

trans-unit.source: Verbs are rendered as links directly in the title bar.
trans-unit.target: 動詞命令直接呈現在標題列中做為連結。
